Namespace $.ext.Class

namespace $.ext.Class
This module defines methods for handling class creation and inheritance.

function namespace

public static Object namespace(String ns)
Creates namespaces to be used for scoping variables and classes so that they are not global. Specifying the last node of a namespace implicitly creates all other nodes. Usage: 
  //will make sure global (window) variable org with property myorg with property utils is present
  $.ext.Class.namespace('org.myorg.utils');
  org.myorg.utils.Widget = function() { ... }
  org.myorg.MyClass = function(config) { ... }
Parameters:
ns - namespace string
Returns:
The namespace object. (the last namespace created)
